data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BAoTbYBuVTcQ7kNvgGyjBN0&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBlmqo_JNUG7YyhqJrkJuMJvTzghmodYhvVbvq5GeUMsw&oe=66B358B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=wJz3CMIuM1IQ7kNvgGRV7iY&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBFDxD-aP8blaZ14u8p0tcf5-zoWFyFtc7fS3hrzu5WfA&oe=66B36652)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=CDd1edrxMJcQ7kNvgF3RxlE&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAOtDziE_jdrFTD_JIxvUL8ZevtI6XWOzCo2AU7z_KWiA&oe=66B35189)
